title: SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest-Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair-Backrest and Seat Height Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support(Gray)-Fabric
descriptions:
Introducing the SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest-Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair! 

Designed for comfort and style, this gaming chair is perfect for both gaming and office work. The chair comes in a sleek Gray color with a Fabric material that is both durable and comfortable. 

The overall dimensions of the chair are 23 inches wide, 20 inches deep, and can be adjusted in height from 49 inches to 52 inches. The seat panel measures 20.5 inches wide and 20.8 inches deep, while the back panel is 22 inches wide and 32.6 inches high. The chair also features a 3.2-inch height adjustment for a customizable seating experience.

With a weight capacity of up to 300 lbs, this chair is built to support individuals of various sizes. The SGS certified 4-level cylinder ensures stability and durability.

The ergonomic design of this chair provides optimal support and comfort. The high-back ergonomic design promotes good posture and reduces strain on your back. The chair can swivel a full 360 degrees, allowing for easy movement. You can also recline the chair from 90 degrees to 150 degrees for when you need to relax or take a break. The retractable footrest provides additional comfort and support.

The chair is equipped with adjustable lumbar support and upholstered armrests for added convenience. The seat cushion is made of soft and high-density thicken sponge for maximum comfort during long hours of use.

This gaming chair is not only comfortable but also easy to assemble. It comes with a satisfaction guarantee, and if you're not completely satisfied, you can return it with no questions asked. Parts replacement is also available for any issues that may arise.

Upgrade your gaming or work setup with the SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest-Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair. Order yours today and experience the ultimate in comfort and style!
